message.communityFundSubTitle1: The Worlds Most Advanced Community Fund
message.communityFundSubTitle2: Projects are funded and approved by the decentralized network with no central authority. This ensures Navcoin’s direction remains firmly in the best interest of the entire network. This fund pays you to take your idea, nurture it, and build a team to bring it to life.
message.createProposalMissingDescription: Please specify a description for your proposal
message.createProposalMissingAmount: Please specify requested amount for your proposal
message.createProposalMissingAddress: Please specify a payment address for your proposal
message.createProposalMissingTimeline: Please specify a timeline for your proposal
message.enterVerifyMessage: Please enter a message, address and a signature
message.acceptTerms: I accept the terms of use
message.passwordInfo1: Please enter a strong password of at least 6 characters for your wallet.
message.passwordInfo2: This password can never be recovered or reset!
message.backupInfo1: Since only you control your money, you’ll need to save your backup phrase in case this app is deleted.
message.backupInfo2: Your wallet is never saved to cloud storage or standard device backups.
message.confirmDeleteContact: Are you sure you want to delete the contact?
message.confirmCloseQuestion: Do you want to close the app?
message.stakingIntroduction:
With NEXT Mobile, you can easily do Cold Staking with one touch.

 Non-custodial
 Only wallet owner have spending permission
 Track your staking rewards in your wallet
message.stakingNoBalance: You have no NAV in your wallet. Deposit some NAV into your wallet to start the staking process.
message.confirmColdStakingQuestion: We will create a cold staking address for your public address and send all your NAV's to your cold staking address. Once the process is complete, you can start earning rewards with cold staking. Do you approve the cold staking startup process?
message.sweepPrivateKeyDescription: If you have a private key for your Navcoin's in another wallet, paste this key in the field below. If the private key you provided is correct and there is NAV at the specified address, all NAVs will be transferred to your wallet.
message.enterPrivateKey: Please enter a valid private key
message.noUTXO: No NAV was found in this address. No UTXO record found.
message.coldStakingFAQ:
• The staking rewards you earn can vary depending on the amount of NAV you have and the amount of active NAV stake in the network.
  • If possible, install and run your own Navcoin node. When you set up your own node, you support the decentralization of the network.
  • If you wish, you can also do Cold Staking with NavPool, NavCash.
message.confirmZapWalletMessage: This option resets the sync history and allows you to sync again when the wallet restarts. Do you confirm?
message.noFeaturedProposal: There are currently no featured proposal.

message.swapType: You can swap your public (NAV) and private (xNAV) coins in your wallet

message.confirmColdStakingStopQuestion: Cold staking will be stopped and all of your NAV's from your delegated cold staking address will be sent to your wallet address. Do you confirm?
message.coldStakingDepositRequired: You need to deposit NAV to your wallet.

message.walletSyncProgressInfo: The wallet is currently syncing, the balances won't be accurate.

message.sendTokenInfo: Please indicate the token you want to send, the xNAV address of the recipient and the amount you want to send. The memo field is optional. If you specify, the recipient will be able to see the memo information.
message.sendNFTInfo: Please indicate the NFT you want to send and the xNAV address of the recipient. The memo field is optional. If you specify, the recipient will be able to see the memo information.
